name: Tumblr // Font Family & Size
description: Let's you change the font that is displayed on tumblr. This userstyle only works on the dashboard, please let me know if something has been missed/is too big or small. The font you want to use must be installed on your computer for this userstyle to work.
additional_info: 11/08/2020 - Updated the code to be less lines and to work with xkit and changes tumblr has made over the last couple of years. I've been updating this for myself but kept forgetting to update it on here for whoever else finds this useful. Sorry it's taken me so long, though I'm not sure if people really found this useful in the first place. XD 4/15/2017 - I think I've gotten everything fixed up.
